1.speaker: Jaheira
1.text: Archdruid. You appear to gather a rather fanatic following wherever you go. A noble thing, to serve nature so tirelessly.
1.context: NodeContext: Amused, kinda being a little bit nosy in reference to the many romances Halsin can strike up throughout the game.

0.speaker: Halsin
0.text: I welcome all of nature's blessings, whether they come to me one at a time, or in multitudes. There is no shame in it.

2.speaker: Jaheira
2.text: Consider me put in my place. Clearly, I have been spending too much time among the city-folk.
2.context: NodeContext: Backing off, conceding the point - she overstepped a little
